author: @prashantkumar-hr2ql

text:
3:50
I have been riding Okinawa Electric Ridge Plus for a decent time now, it's got the same thing. The moment you hold LEFT / REAR brake, the throttle is cut off. 
I used to think it's a problem, but believe me, it's not. After hours and hours of city traffic rides and bumper-to-bumper traffic encounters, I can literally confidently say that it's ACTUALLY one of the BEST features. It totally removes of stress of accidentally accelerating, gives a you a clear and defined choice and mobility, plus you can panic brake without having to worry about a slightest thing.  

5:15
I'm 6'2". I'll be very happy riding this bike ! What's a great problem for you is actually a great FEATURE for me !

8:10 
The portable charger storage space is a small cubby Under the Seat. You missed it.

author: @unexpected-pwr

text:
Using RV 400 since one year . 
If you are a Rowdy Sheeter and if you can fight with the Showroom guys everyday ..
 Only then you must buy this bike. 
My bike is 2022 August model  has Done 8000 kms .baught it for 1.75 lakhs rupees . I will sell you with thanks for 1 lakhs ..
 also will thank you so very  much . 
The showroom people will keep your bike for atleast 35-40 days. 
No spares available in the showroom or in the market.
No body repairs outside the showroom . 
Even for a minor issue you should leave the bike in the service centre for minimum 40 days..and you will only get your bike  if you fight with them daily.. 
I'm not kidding... Seriously .. bhaii sab chor ... 
90 thousand . 
90 thousand may laylay mujhsay bike .
. bhai please .Bhai please .
